articles.description: Naga Munchetty's sparkly Christmas outfit left BBC Breakfast viewers distracted on Saturday Morning as the host made a return to the red sofa.

articles.title: Couple who hate Wham!'s Last Christmas raise £50,000 to buy it and stop it being played - The Mirror
